issue.title: [C++] Faster ascii_lower and ascii_upper
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9131](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9131). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The current version is using a lookup table for doing the case conversion. Using <http://quick-bench.com/JaDErmVCY23Z1tu6YZns_KBt0qU> it seems using a boolean check and +/-32 seems ~5x times faster (4.6x for clang 9, 6.4x for GCC  9.2).
